commit.message: Bump version to v1.2.3
Fix tests and augment test coverage

Fix XPath parser arguments and descendants tests

  - XPath2Parser argument variables renamed to variable_types
  - XPathContext argument variable_values renamed to variables
  - Clean iter_schema_nodes()
Update issue #171 to the fixed XPath EBV

Adjust XPath path root to elementpath 2.0

  - Do not add schema tag to path for find/findall/iterfind
Add is_key() to XsdUnion
Add xsd_version property to XMLSchemaProxy

Fix currently solvable skipped tests

  - Fix xs:all restriction checking for XSD 1.1
  - Fix is_matching() for wilcards with default_namespace=''

Fix encoding method of JsonMLConverter

  - Put simple content on text part for a mixed content with empty group

Check and fix skipped tests

  - Fix xs:override processing (ignore missing components)
  - Fix inheritable attribute changes in restrictions
  - Fix xs:base64Binary validation
  - Fix xs:all restriction with an xs:choice group
  - Parse error if XPath selector select an XSD attribute
  - Fix has_occurs_restriction() for empty particles
  - Fix choice model restriction check
  - Fix QName of not imported '' namespace
Recheck skipped tests and extend version control to XSD 1.0
Fix remaining failed W3C tests (assertions and identities)

Fix xsi:nil handling in element decoder

  - Fix several W3C tests (12 remaining, mainly XPath related)
  - Clean and unify tests for QName helper functions
Put a failure test for issue #200
Fix xs:NOTATION validation and wildcard validation of XSI namespace

Fix xs:dateTime test and update XPath processor dependency

  - Restrict to minor version to avoid regressions: xmlschema is
    stricly dependant on XPath datatypes so a fix on elementpath
    can break older tests on XSD datatypes in xmlschema.
Fix check and iteration of empty model groups
Fix substitutes iteration for XSD elements

Decouple maps for XSD components

  - An XSD wildcard now can have different global maps than the
    maps related with the schema attribute. This is needed for
    doing the right namespace lookups for xs:anyType when the
    schema uses the class's meta-schema.
  - XsdComponent.maps property changed to an instance attribute
Add xs:unique identity check for nilled elements

Update .travis.yml for Windows OS jobs

  - Pre-install certifi package to avoid SSL verification errors
  - Update test to Python 3.7.7 and add a new job with 3.8.3
Merge branch 'develop' for upgrading to release v1.2.2
Fix tests and update release information

Fix XMLSchemaContext

  - Define iter_schema_nodes() for iterating XPath schema nodes.
  - Replace old protected methods with _iter_nodes() an overridable
    iteration method that will be added in elementpath v1.4.6. The
    new method iterates once also the element references. A set is
    now used for detecting loops also for schema iter() method.
  - Add IdentityXPathContext that uses iter_schema_nodes().

Fix for issue #197

  - Use of an improble path instead of /tmp to check sandbox mode
    with base_url
Fix documentation

Fix URL checking for Windows OS

  - Add tests for URL helper function and remove unused code

Fix content type classification (issue #195)

  - XsdSimpleType.has_simple_content() aligned with XSD content type
    classification (empty, simple, element-only, mixed)
  - Add simple_type and model_group properties to XSD types
  - Rename XsdComplexType.content_type to content and add a property
    for the old name
  - Add variety property to simple types (can be 'atomic', 'union', 'list')
  - Add scope and value_constraint properties to elements and attributes
  - Update docs adding a paragraph on content type classification
Fix issue #196: typo in etree_iterpath() recursion
Update to release v1.2.1
